text: You know, I don't think any mother aims to be a single mom. I didn't wish for that, but it happened.
author: Charlize Theron

text: My mom decorated with lots of antiques. I never liked it when I was a little girl - I wanted to live in a modern house. But now I love it.
author: Paris Hilton

text: Looking back, I think I was always musical. My dad was very musical, and I think my mom was musical.
author: Paul McCartney

text: It wasn't so long ago that I was a working mom myself. And I know that sometimes, much as we all hate to admit it, it's just easier to park the kids in front of the TV for a few hours, so we can pay the bills or do the laundry or just have some peace and quiet for a change.
author: Michelle Obama

text: The person who has inspired me my whole life is my Mom, because she taught me commitment. She sacrificed.
author: Mike Krzyzewski
